ArticleInfo.ArticleTitle: Unsteady Hydromagnetic Flow of a Reactive Viscous Fluid in a Vertical Channel with Thermal Diffusion, Diffusion-Thermal and Variable Viscosity Effects

Abstract.Para: Unsteady/steady hydromagnetic natural convection and mass transfer flow characteristics of viscous reactive, incompressible, and electrically conducting fluid in the presence of a transverse magnetic field, thermal diffusion effect, diffusion-thermal effect, and temperature-dependent variable viscosity is investigated. The nonlinear governing equations are solved numerically usan ing unconditionally stable and convergent semi-implicit finite difference scheme. Numerical results are displayed and discussed graphically for various physical parameters embedded in the problem.
